title: SC EP:341 Encounters with the old man of the forest
itunes:title: SC EP:341 Encounters with the old man of the forest
description:
Tonight I will be welcoming back to the show Lee Woods. Lee talks about a recent sighting they had while out investigating Sasquatch.

Lee says, “I never told my friend about this creature the locals call the old man. When people see this creature they describe him as being a gray/white color. The night we were in one of my area’s my friend who is not really into bigfoot saw this creature and described it to a tee. Sam was in front of me about 20 feet when he shined the light right on this thing….”
content:encoded:
